### Update Type

- [ ] **New evidence** â€” Adding sources not currently in dossier
- [ ] **Evidence upgrade** â€” Higher-grade source replacing existing
- [ ] **Correction** â€” Fixing factual error with evidence
- [ ] **Data refresh** â€” Updated numbers from existing source
